Mod.name: Tales of Kupoli (things mod)
Mod.description:
Hello Mina.
A collection of things.
[h3]Features[/h3] [list] [*] 58 spells [*] 28 wands and items [*] 7 perks [*] 4 enemies [*] 1 boss [*] Harvest the souls from enemies to fuel spells (12 soul types to find and use) [*] Use your souls to cast spells from (and upgrade) a magic tome [*] Create new Suns (green and red and possibly blue) [*] Special wands, spells, and other items drop from enemies [*] Revive bosses for new rewards [*] Uncover secrets and tales (of Kupoli) [/list]
[h3] Cross-mod interactions with: [/h3] [b]Copi's Things[/b] spells added to reward pools [b]Graham's Things[/b] spells added to reward pools [b]Apotheosis[/b] new soul types For optimal performance make sure Tales of Kupoli loads after any mods that add perks.
Not compatible with mods that add more tower wands, as this mod adds more tower wands.
